A Front-end Web Developer living and working in Yorkshire, England. Currently the front-end developer for Nouveau HD Beauty Group, a permanent makeup training company.

Work.

Townscaper Community

A place to share and discuss Townscaper builds with other users.

Align Growth Summit

This annual event had a facelift for 2020 as well as some last minute changes due to the Covid-19 Pandemic.

K.B Pro

The K.B Pro Shop was in need of a fresh look and refined approach to it's product configurations. In 2019 I took the lead on the shop redesign project with a primary focus on refining the user experience and increasing revenue.

Emerald Kitchens

Emerald Kitchens was due a website update to fit with it's new branding and diversified product offerings. I took up the challenge to redesign and rebuild the site, focussing on encouraging users to get in touch or pick up the phone.
